name: Longsword I
description: Increases Attack by 10%.

name: Magic Mail
description: Always move first, regardless of Speed.

name: Running Shoes I
description: Increases Speed by 10%.

name: Holy Aura I
description: Heals 5% of Max Health after each attack.

name: Cloak I
description: 5% chance to dodge attack.

name: Green Ring I
description: Green moves do 10% more damage.

name: Blue Ring I
description: Blue moves do 10% more damage.

name: Red Ring I
description: Red moves do 10% more damage.

name: Violet Ring I
description: All moves do 5% more damage.

name: Green Necklace I
description: Take 15% less damage from Green moves.

name: Blue Necklace I
description: Take 15% less damage from Blue moves.

name: Red Necklace I
description: Take 15% less damage from Red moves.

name: Violet Necklace I
description: Take 10% less damage from moves.

name: Evil Aura I
description: Attacks do 20% more damage in exchange for some health after every attack.

name: Mirror
description: First attack reflects damage back to foe, then this equipment breaks.

name: Rope I
description: Take 20% less damage from attacks, but deal 20% less damage and lower speed in exchange.

name: Strawberry
description: Heal damage taken from a move that does more than 30% of max health once per battle.

name: Thorns I
description: Foe takes 1 damage every time they do damage to you.

name: Sleep
description: You cannot move until you wake up.

name: Burned
description: 8% of your Max Health is depleted after every one of your turns.

name: Frozen
description: Speed is halved.

name: Aim
description: Next move used will have 100 accuracy.

name: Blue Mist
description: You take 30% less from Blue moves.

name: Green Mist
description: You take 30% less from Green moves.

name: Red Mist
description: You take 30% less from Red moves.

name: Blue Room
description: All Blue moves have 50% more Power.

name: Blue Roots
description: Opposing Blue moves have 20% less Power.

name: Green Roots
description: Opposing Green moves have 20% less Power.

name: Red Roots
description: Opposing Red moves have 20% less Power.

name: Calming Meadow
description: You will fall asleep the turn after you are affected by this.

name: Insomnia
description: Prevents falling asleep.

name: Downstream
description: Your moves do 30% more damage.

name: Fiery Punch
description: Your next move has 20 less Accuracy.

name: Fiery Tackle
description: Your next move has 20 more Accuracy.

name: Fire Frenzy
description: Your Red stat is set to 0.

name: Gamble
description: Your next move will have 50 Accuracy.

name: Garden
description: Healing after each turn.

name: Rising Tide
description: Rising Tide has an additional 20 Power.

name: Storm
description: Take damage equal to your Red stat at the end of every turn.

name: Wonder Room
description: All added effects, including Equipment, are nullified, and none can be applied.
